content: BOSTON  Jan 27 Red Hat Inc and other makers of the widely used Linux operating system for business computers updated their software on Tuesday to thwart a serious new cyber threat they warned could allow hackers to gain remote control of their systems.
name: Red Hat Inc
title: Linux makers release patch to thwart new 'Ghost' cyber threat
